net.jawr.web.servlet

Class JawrServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • net.jawr.web.servlet.JawrServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, EventListener, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, javax.servlet.ServletContextListener

    public class JawrServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
implements javax.servlet.ServletContextListener
    Main Jawr servlet. Maps logical URLs to script bundles, which are generated on the fly (may be cached), and served as a single file.
    Author:
    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
